meta.description: Aaron Laigaie, one of the founders of the Proud Boys and a Covid denier and anti vaxxer has died of Covid.

title: “Proud boy” leading member, Aaron Laigaie, died from Covid
cleaned_text:
Medical outsider restricted to echo chamber. Who is "we"? fake News?

 

 Since you are a math outsider, you may not understand the life expectancy of someone who allegedly dies infected is higher than the life expectancy of the general population. One of your math crippled comrades said covid reduced life expectancy.

I can't believe that you are still peddling this innumerate nonsense. You have been schooled on how to calculate a simple mean on several occasions. Thank goodness you are not in a profession where basic numeracy is a requirement, accountancy, medicine or yacht sailing for example.

opengraph.description: Aaron Laigaie, one of the founders of the Proud Boys and a Covid denier and anti vaxxer has died of Covid.
